title: リトライハンドラ
reason: Common handler used extensively in Nablarch batch architecture. Module: nablarch-fw-standalone. Used in batch processing for recoverable errors like database deadlocks. Referenced in batch architecture documentation as a key component.

title: プロセス多重起動防止ハンドラ
reason: Batch-focused handler. Module: nablarch-fw-batch. Prevents duplicate batch process execution using request IDs. Explicitly mentioned in batch functional comparison documentation.

title: スタンドアローン型アプリケーション共通ハンドラ
reason: Index page for standalone handlers - generic category is appropriate as it covers handlers used by both batch and other standalone applications

title: リクエストスレッド内ループ制御ハンドラ
reason: Used for resident processes monitoring message queues/database tables. Module: nablarch-fw-standalone. Not specific to on-demand batch patterns (FILE-DB, DB-DB, DB-FILE). Keep generic as it's for continuous monitoring processes.

title: プロセス停止制御ハンドラ
reason: Used with loop handlers including batch-specific handlers. Module: nablarch-fw-standalone and nablarch-fw-batch. Extensively referenced in batch architecture documentation for stopping long-running batch processes.

title: データリードハンドラ
reason: Core handler for reading input data using DataReader in batch processing. Module: nablarch-fw-standalone. Explicitly mentioned in Nablarch batch architecture as essential component for sequential data reading. Supports max record count feature used in batch processing.

title: マルチスレッド実行制御ハンドラ
reason: Used for parallel execution in batch processing. Module: nablarch-fw-standalone. Extensively referenced in Nablarch batch architecture for multi-threaded batch processing patterns. Essential for batch performance optimization.

title: ステータスコード→プロセス終了コード変換ハンドラ
reason: Converts status codes to process exit codes for standalone applications. Module: nablarch-fw-standalone. Extensively referenced in batch architecture as first handler after Main launcher. Essential for batch process exit code management.

title: 共通起動ランチャ
reason: Entry point for standalone applications including batch. Module: nablarch-fw-standalone. Used to launch batch applications via java command. Initializes system repository and executes handler queue.

title: HTTPメッセージングエラー制御ハンドラ
reason: HTTP messaging is out of scope per CLAUDE.md. Keep generic handler category only.

title: HTTPメッセージングリクエスト変換ハンドラ
reason: HTTP messaging is out of scope per CLAUDE.md. Keep generic handler category only.

title: HTTPメッセージング専用ハンドラ
reason: HTTP messaging is out of scope per CLAUDE.md. Keep generic handler category only.

title: HTTPメッセージングレスポンス変換ハンドラ
reason: HTTP messaging is out of scope per CLAUDE.md. Keep generic handler category only.

title: データベース接続管理ハンドラ
reason: Common handler used across all database-accessing patterns. Module: nablarch-core-jdbc, nablarch-common-jdbc. Essential for batch (FILE-DB, DB-DB, DB-FILE) and REST patterns that access databases. Should be included in both categories.

title: グローバルエラーハンドラ
reason: Common handler for uncaught exceptions. Module: nablarch-fw. Used in both batch and REST patterns for error handling. Should be at the top of handler queue for all application types.

title: スレッドコンテキスト変数管理ハンドラ
reason: Common handler for managing thread context (request ID, user ID, etc.). Module: nablarch-fw. Used in both batch and REST patterns. Referenced in batch architecture as prerequisite for process_stop_handler.

title: 共通ハンドラ
reason: Index page for common handlers - generic category is appropriate as these handlers are truly common across multiple patterns

title: スレッドコンテキスト変数削除ハンドラ
reason: Paired with ThreadContextHandler to clean up thread-local values. Module: nablarch-fw. Used in both batch and REST patterns for proper thread context cleanup.

title: リクエストディスパッチハンドラ
reason: Request dispatch handler is primarily for web applications (out of scope per CLAUDE.md - focus on batch & REST only). Keep generic handler category.

title: 認可チェックハンドラ
reason: Permission checking is typically needed for REST APIs to control access. Module: nablarch-fw. Not typically used in batch processing. Add REST category.

title: リクエストハンドラエントリ
reason: Request handler entry is generic infrastructure. Module: nablarch-fw. Keep generic handler category only.

title: サービス提供可否チェックハンドラ
reason: Service availability checking is typically needed for REST APIs to control service access during maintenance. Module: nablarch-fw. Add REST category.

title: トランザクション制御ハンドラ
reason: Common handler for transaction control. Module: nablarch-core-transaction, nablarch-core-jdbc. Essential for both batch (database operations) and REST patterns. Must be paired with DbConnectionManagementHandler.

title: 出力ファイル開放ハンドラ
reason: Closes output files opened with FileRecordWriterHolder. Module: nablarch-core-dataformat. Primarily used in batch processing for DB-FILE and FILE-FILE patterns. Add batch-nablarch category.

title: InjectForm インターセプタ
reason: Web application interceptor - out of scope per CLAUDE.md (focus on batch & REST only). Keep generic handler category.

title: UseTokenインターセプタ
reason: Web application interceptor for CSRF protection - out of scope per CLAUDE.md (focus on batch & REST only). Keep generic handler category.
